mapper.sql: bannerID, bannerPic, bannerTitle, link, datetime, prior
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bk_banner (bannerPic, bannerTitle, link, datetime, prior) VALUES (#{bannerPic},#{bannerTitle},#{link},#{datetime},#{prior})
mapper.update: UPDATE bk_banner SET bannerPic=#{bannerPic}, bannerTitle=#{bannerTitle}, link=#{link}, datetime=#{datetime}, prior=#{prior} WHERE bannerID=#{bannerID}
